title: When can i get my honor level back?
body:
I got a 14 day ban in November of last year and ever since I haven't been able to get my honour level back??
does anyone know how I can earn my honour level back please?

replies.body:
Essentially by being neutral or positive in game. Obviously being positive earns you honour faster though. You don't have to be perfect, but if you display negativity in game (even if it isn't enough to get you punished) it will prevent you from earning honour points from that game.

There's no specific amount of time it takes, it's very individual.
You must capture the Avatar and bring him to the Fire Lord.
You don't. Once you hit 0, you're stuck there.
